data.name: Isle of Dinosaurs 2D
data.detailed_description:
Isle of Dinosaurs 2D is a classic action-adventure maze game with pixel art graphics
featuring two playable characters, co-op gameplay and dinosaurs.

One day, upon returning from school with your friend, you decide to
play hide and seek and hide in the upstairs room of your grandpa.
In one of the rooms there are two ceremonial mask hanging on the wall.

The masks have distinct features, one is for a male and another one is for a female.
Using a chair, you and your friend manage to climb and reach them.

You sneak in the backyard garden without your grandpa noticing and to your surprise,
through the crystal eye sockets of your mask, you observe a secret portal close
to the big tree that your grandpa has in the garden.

Stepping closer to the tree you teleport into another world.

Welcome to Isle of Dinosaurs aka IOD, a prehistoric realm that is filled with different
dinosaurs and other mysterious creatures.

Key Features


* 2d pixel art graphics
* top-down view of the world
* warm colors, classic pixel art key-frames animations
* PG-13 friendly story and gameplay (Nintendo like)
* no flashes, no screen shakes, no particles generated in excess
* co-op, shared keyboard or keyboard + controller
* dinosaurs

Characters


You can choose between playing a boy or girl:



Dinosaurs NPCs:

- young and elder Anky

- young and elder Rex

- young and elder Ptery

* New dinosaurs will be announced after full implementation is ready.
* Initial demo will contain these 3 dinosaurs.

Gameplay


* Maps are maze like, you have to collect powerups and items that will help you teleport back home.
* You will face mini-challenges and mini-games.

data.short_description: You got teleported into a prehistoric world. It's time to show the inhabiting dinosaurs why you are not extinct and return back home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570 or similar
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570 or similar
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and later
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570 or similar
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
